parameters.name: EventType
parameters.description:
The type of the DDoS attack event that was queried. Valid values:

*   *   **web-cc**: web resource exhaustion attacks
*   *   **cc**: connection flood attacks
*   *   **traffic**: volumetric attacks

If you do not configure this parameter, DDoS attack events of all types are queried.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: **10**. Valid values: 5, 10, and 20.
